title: Premium Outreach Specialist
description:
Our team is seeking a confident, sharp, and ambitious Lead Outreach Specialist (full-time) to support business growth at Yamammi, a fast-growing premium Influencer Marketing & UGC Agency based in Dubai, working with top lifestyle, beauty, wellness, hospitality, and luxury brands.



This role is for someone with proven experience in B2B outreach, lead generation, or sales outreach, who is confident communicating, understands premium positioning, and can represent the agency professionally.



You will work closely with the Founder, and be responsible for reaching out to the top brands in the UAE and worldwide, opening conversations with decision-makers, and help shape the growth of a fast-scaling agency from the inside.



JOB DETAILS:

- Proactively reach out to brands via
, LinkedIn, Instagram, and WhatsApp

- Write smart, personalized outreach messages (no copy-paste spam)

- Book intro calls and hand over qualified leads to the Founder

- Track outreach, replies, and statuses in Google Sheets

- Continuously improve outreach scripts, angles, and targeting

- Report daily/weekly on outreach activity and results



REQUIREMENTS:

- Fluent English (written & spoken) - mandatory

- Proven experience in lead outreach, B2B sales, lead generation, or similar

- Comfortable reaching out to high-end brands and decision-makers

- Strong written communication and persuasion skills

- Can work independently and take ownership

- Honest, reliable, and professional

- Good internet connection and quiet workspace



PROVIDED:

- Full onboarding and training on Yamammi outreach strategy 

- Verified Lead list for the Outreach

- Direct access to the Founder

- Structured outreach & tracking system

- High-performance, no-drama, ownership-driven culture

- Long-term growth into Senior Outreach / Brand Partnerships Lead

- Work inside a premium UAE-based influencer agency



HOURS:

- Full-time (min. 6 hours per day)

- Must overlap with Dubai working hours



RATE:

$350/month



HOW TO RESPOND:

1. Reply to this job post with a link (NB!) to your resume.

2. Write a short message (3–5 lines) about your experience in lead outreach / sales / B2B communication.

3. In your message, include the word “watermelon” at the beginning of your application so we know you pay attention to details.

title: Credit Repair Specialist (Experienced)
description:
Credit Repair Specialist (Experienced)



Read before applying.



We are hiring an experienced Credit Repair Specialist who can work independently and follow SOPs without hand-holding.



REQUIREMENTS (NON-NEGOTIABLE)



• Credit repair experience required

• Strong administrative support skills

• Able to follow written SOPs

• Experience disputing and filing complaints (BBB, Attorney General, CFPB preferred)

• Clear communication

• Quiet work environment

• Available during U.S. Central Standard Time (CST)

• Comfortable using ChatGPT to problem-solve independently

• Must have the paid version of ChatGPT (ChatGPT Plus)



Other relevant skills are welcome.



PAY & TRACKING (READ CAREFULLY)



• Paid bi-weekly

• We use Timeproof on OnlineJobs.ph

• Time tracking is required — no exceptions



Do NOT apply if you are confused about how pay works.



INTERVIEW REQUIREMENTS



• Camera ON — face must be shown

• Professional environment (no background noise)

title: InDesign Designer / Visual Storytelling Expert (Interior Design Booklet)
description:
We’re looking for a highly skilled InDesign (or similar) designer to transform an existing written guide into a polished, professional, high-end digital booklet (PDF).



The right person will understand the objective of the document, then use layout, typography, imagery, and visual hierarchy to reinforce the value being taught.



The guide teaches interior design principles related to visual perception, spatial illusion, and paint techniques, so design decisions must intentionally support those ideas.



Interior design experience (or strong familiarity with interior spaces) is strongly preferred.



What You’ll Be Working With



A fully written interior design guide (content is complete)

Clear educational intent: teaching how paint and color placement alter perceived space

The end product is a premium, downloadable PDF booklet (educational + brand-forward)



Responsibilities



Design a professional, cohesive booklet layout using Adobe InDesign

Establish strong visual hierarchy (headings, subheadings, callouts, diagrams, spacing)

Translate abstract concepts (depth, height, width, contrast, perception) into clear visual support

Source or create photo-realistic, high-quality imagery that:

Illustrates interior design concepts accurately

Matches the tone of a high-end interior design brand



Can include AI-generated images only if they are photo-realistic and professional

Ensure imagery reinforces what is being taught (not generic décor photos)

Apply consistent typography, spacing systems, and grid structure

Prepare final files for digital distribution (PDF)



Required Skills



Expert-level Adobe InDesign

Strong layout, typography, and editorial design skills

Ability to think conceptually and visually (not just execute instructions)

Experience sourcing or generating photo-realistic interior imagery (If needed, we can assist with this)

Excellent attention to detail and consistency

Ability to understand written content and translate meaning into visuals



Strongly Preferred



Background or experience in interior design, interior decorating, architecture, or real estate design

Experience designing:

Design guides

Lookbooks

Educational PDFs

Premium brand documents



Familiarity with visual storytelling and educational design

Comfort using AI image tools responsibly (Midjourney, DALL·E, etc.) with realism as a requirement



What We Care About Most:



You can look at written content and say:

“Here’s how the layout and visuals should reinforce this idea.”



You care about clarity, elegance, and intention

You can make a document feel premium, modern, and authoritative

title: Digital Marketer (Ecommerce/Social Media)
description:
APPLICATION PROCESS:

1.
 us your resume in PDF format only. Include all of the jobs you've worked at and the month + year. Do not leave anything off. Do not leave anything off. You must provide an explanation of any gaps in your work history. Include the compensation you received for each job. Do not give us your hourly pay, only your annual compensation or total compensation. If there is any gap in your resume without an explanation of the gap, you will be disqualified.



2.
 us a 60-second video of yourself answering the following question:

What are the 3 most important things that the company you work for MUST do to show you that they care about you? For example, if they don’t give me these 3 things then that means they don’t care about me. The video CANNOT EXCEED 60 seconds, or you will automatically be disqualified.



3. IMPORTANT: Please
 the above two items to 
 to follow the above instructions will result in automatic disqualifications. Do not DM us or call us or contact us in any other way.



ABOUT OUR COMPANY:

Achieve Integrative Health is the #1 rated Acupuncture & Wellness Clinic in the United States with over 750 five star google reviews. Our Mission is to help people restore their body’s God given ability to heal itself so that they can do what they love. Our vision is to equip and inspire one million people around the world to do what they love, when they want, with whom they want. (
)



BENEFITS & COMPENSATION

* Competitive Total Compensation = $6-$12 USD/hr (base salary + bonuses)

* Unlimited Opportunities for Growth = as long as you can generate more results for the company we will never limit your ability to grow within our company. Every tea
mber can also become a partner of the business if they desire.

* Other Benefits for qualified tea
mbers = paid-time off, premiu
dical insurance, Employee Savings Matching Program

* Work from Home = no more 2-4 hour commutes to work

* Wellness Initiatives = benefit from complimentary virtual health services from our medical providers, ensuring your well-being and your family’s well-being is always a priority.

* everybody starts at $6 usd/hr during the first 3 months probation period.  The first 3 months we are testing your technical skills.

* After the first 3 months, your productions will be evaluated based on our standards of editing. We will rate your productions on a scale of 1 to 5. 5 is your productions are 100% in alignment with our standards of editing. 3 = your productions are 50% in alignment with our standards of editing. 1 = your productions are completely opposite of our standards of editing.

* a rating of 5 will result in your base salary increasing to $10/hr and you'll qualify to earn quarterly bonuses, giving you the potential to earn a total compensation of $15/hr.  (note: at this hourly rate, you will be required to produce 2x more than your first 3 months, more pay means more production requirements)

* a rating of 3 will result in no increase in base salary

* a rating of 1 will result in termination of employment



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

* Create and manage our shopify account to promote our e-commerce business

* Edit long form and short form videos daily for e-commerce and clinic and social media

* create & graphics for clinic projects and e-commerce business (eg t-shirt designs) 



TECHNICAL QUALIFICATIONS:

* We do not provide training for technical skills (multimedia editing, shopify) you are expected to already know how to do this

* you must have experience with Shopify and ecommerce sites

* must be able to edit videos & graphics quickly everyday

* must be highly organized as you will need to manage multiple tasks everyday



CHARACTER REQUIREMENTS:

• You must truly have a caring heart and truly want to help people improve their health, if you are mainly focused on how much money you can make, we are not the team for you

• You must be able to follow instructions exactly as written, if you don’t like reading or following instructions, we are not the right team for you

• You must have a good heart. If you like to gossip behind peoples back, please don’t apply.

• You must value Results over effort. If you like to be paid based on how many tasks you completed or how much responsibilities you have, we are not the team for you. We pay ONLY based on you meeting your KPIs, metrics, quotas.

• You must be honest and have integrity. If you are caught lying, you will be immediately terminated.

• You must want to EARN your pay (ie. base salary + bonuses) instead of being given a pay (ie. focused only on base salary) that you didn’t earn.



WORK SCHEDULE:

* Full-time = minimum of 40 hrs/wk.  You have the flexibility to choose your work hours, however, all tasks must be completed & submitted by 5am CST everyday M-F, and you required to attend our morning team huddles from 8:09am-8:45am cst M-F.



* Part-time = 20 hrs/wk. You have the flexibility to choose your work hours, however, all tasks must be completed & submitted by 5am CST everyday M-F, and you required to attend our morning team huddles from 8:09am-8:45am cst M-F.

title: Technical Support Specialist
description:
JavaScript is an absolute must for this role and will be tested during the interview process.




 automates data intake workflows for financial services companies in the United States. We’re looking for a JavaScript-focused developer to build, customize, and implement complex workflows on the Feathery platform for enterprise customers.



In this role, you’ll design and implement end-to-end workflows using our logic and rules engine, integrate with internal and third-party systems via APIs, and build solutions that move data reliably between platforms. You’ll work hands-on with JavaScript to customize behavior, manipulate data, and implement business logic beyond what standard configuration allows.



You’ll be working closely with customers and internal teams to build scalable solutions, troubleshoot issues in real-world implementations, and help design best practices for advanced use cases on the Feathery platform. This is a developer-first role focused on building and integration—not traditional technical support.

title: Customer Service Representative (English/Spanish)
description:
*** Client Care Coordinator (English/Spanish)

Full-Time | Long-Term | U.S.-Based Company

Idaho Elite Inspection Team



*** This Is NOT a Typical Virtual Assistant Job

If you’re looking for a role where you’re treated like a real tea
mber—not a faceless voice behind a screen—this may be the opportunity you’ve been waiting for.



At Idaho Elite Inspection Team, our Client Care Coordinators are trusted professionals who play a key role in how our company operates, serves clients, and grows revenue.

You’ll be trained, supported, and valued—not micromanaged or ignored.



***  About Us

Idaho Elite Inspection Team is the highest-rated home inspection company in Southeast Idaho.

We’re known for professionalism, attention to detail, and outstanding customer service.

Our Client Care Coordinators are the first voice our clients hear and the people who turn inquiries into confident, well-served customers.



*** What You’ll Be Doing

???? Client Communication

Speaking confidently, clearly, and professionally

Creating a calm, positive experience for every caller



*** Scheduling & Coordination

Scheduling inspections accurately using our systems

Confirming appointments with clients and agents

Handling reschedules and special cases correctly



*** Systems & Admin

Working inside our scheduling and CRM systems

Following clear scripts, processes, and procedures

Keeping records accurate and up to date



*** Revenue Support (Ethical Sales)

Explaining inspection packages and upgrade options

Recommending additional services when appropriate

Understanding how your conversations impact company revenue

You won’t be guessing—we provide clear scripts, training, and expectations.



*** Why This Role Is Different

? You’re part of the core operations team

? Full training with a structured 90-day onboarding plan

? Stable, full-time, long-term position

? Performance bonuses tied to company success

? Weekly check-ins and real support

? Clear systems—no chaos, no guessing

The better you do, the more you earn—and the more opportunities you’ll have to grow.



*** Compensation & Benefits

* Year-End Performance Bonus $400-$1,000

***  Who We’re Looking For

Speak excellent English (Spanish is a bonus)

Pay close attention to details

title: Social Media Manager (Instagram-First) – B2B Cocoa Export Business
description:
Morta Produce Ltd is a West Africa–based cocoa producer and exporter, working directly with smallholder farmers to supply high-quality fermented and dried cocoa beans to international buyers.

We operate across:



Cocoa collection & processing (fermentation & drying); Farmer networks and traceability; 

Export-ready cocoa for global B2B buyers; 



Our audience is:

Chocolate makers, Cocoa buyers & traders, Ethical sourcing managers, Importers & distributors



Instagram is used as a credibility and visibility tool to support B2B relationships and inbound enquiries.

Position Morta Produce Ltd as a credible, professional cocoa exporter that international buyers trust.

This role is about Authority; Transparency; Consistency; Storytelling around sourcing, quality, and ethics; Not hype. 

Not influencer content.

Not entertainment-first posting.



KEY RESPONSBILITIES Instagram Strategy (B2B-Led)



Develop a clear Instagram content strategy for a cocoa export business

Align content with buyer trust, quality assurance, and ethical sourcing

Focus on educational, behind-the-scenes, and process-led content

Content Planning & Posting

Plan and schedule weekly content:

Reels (farm, fermentation, drying, export prep)

Carousels (process, quality standards, traceability)

Static posts (announcements, milestones)

Stories (ongoing farm activity, shipping updates)

Write professional, clear captions suitable for international buyers

Brand Positioning

Maintain a consistent, premium, export-ready brand image

Ensure tone reflects professionalism, reliability, and transparency

Highlight farmer networks, origin, and sustainability (without greenwashing)

Engagement & Visibility



Engage with relevant B2B accounts:  Chocolate brands; Cocoa buyers; Ethical sourcing organisations; Support inbound DMs and enquiries (scripts provided); Reporting; Weekly performance summary including: 

Content posted

Reach & saves

Profile visits

Buyer enquiries / meaningful conversations



Ideal Candidate Profile



You’re a strong fit if you:

Have experience managing Instagram for B2B or export-focused businesses

Understand commodities, agriculture, or supply-chain storytelling

Can write clear, professional English

Are comfortable working with process-based content

Are organised, proactive, and consistent



Bonus (not required):

Experience with agriculture, cocoa, coffee, or commodities

Familiarity with ethical sourcing or sustainability messaging

Experience working with UK or European businesses



HOW TO APPLY (Important)



Please include:



A brief introduction and relevant experience



Links to Instagram accounts you’ve managed



A short answer to this question:

“How would you use Instagram to build trust with international cocoa buyers?”



Applications without examples will not be considered.

title: Business operations
description:
Operations & Growth Coordinator

StressKnotNYC — Remote | Full-Time



This is not a typical admin role.

We’re looking for a high-ownership operator who can manage fulfillment AND help grow the business when things are quiet.



You will be the bridge between clients, therapists, and revenue.

When bookings are active, you focus on fulfillment.

When things slow down,  you switch into growth mode.



About StressKnotNYC

StressKnotNYC is a premium in-home massage and wellness company serving New York City and surrounding areas. We connect high-quality clients with elite licensed massage therapists, acupuncturists. We are building a strong operations engine and need someone who can help us run daily operations while also helping us grow.



Your job is simple:

Make sure every client gets taken care of

Make sure therapists are supported

Help bring in more therapists + more clients when things are slow



Primary Responsibilities

1) Fulfillment (Top Priority)

When bookings are active, this comes first.

Answer calls, texts, and
s from clients

Coordinate and schedule massage sessions

Match clients with available therapists

Confirm appointments

Send reminders to clients and therapists

Handle reschedules and cancellations

Support therapists during the day

Follow up with clients after sessions

Request reviews and referrals

You are the control center of daily operations.



2) Therapist Recruitment (When Fulfillment Is Slow)

When inquiries are quiet, switch to building the therapist pipeline.

Source licensed massage therapists on Indeed.

Screen candidates

Schedule interviews

Follow up with applicants

Track candidate pipeline

Help onboard new therapists



Goal: Always keep the therapist bench growing.



3) Business Outreach (When Fulfillment Is Slow)

Help bring in corporate and local business opportunities.

Reach out to local businesses

Reach out to hotels, offices, gyms, studios, etc.

Send
 proposals and make outreach calls

Track responses

Set meetings for leadership



Goal: Build relationships that turn into revenue.



4) Client Reactivation (When Fulfillment Is Slow)

Help generate income from past clients.

Reach out to past clients

Send follow-up
s/texts

Check in and encourage rebooking

Promote new services and availability



Goal: Turn old clients into repeat clients.



You might be a great fit if you:

Take ownership

Stay organized without being told

Communicate clearly and professionally

Are comfortable speaking on the phone

Can switch between tasks quickly

Care about results, not just checking boxes

Think like an operator AND a problem-solver

This role requires someone who can work independently and stay productive and organized.



You help the company by:

Making sure no client inquiry is missed

Keeping therapists scheduled and supported

Bringing in new therapist candidates

Helping create new business opportunities

Re-engaging past clients

You are helping the business run AND grow.



Required Skills

Strong English communication

Customer service experience

Comfortable on phone calls

Organized and detail-oriented

Able to multitask

Reliable and responsive



Bonus if you have experience with:

Scheduling/dispatching

Recruiting

Cold outreach

CRM systems

WE OFFER COMMISSION for every deal due to your outreach efforts.





Please submit a short video introduction (1–2 minutes) answering the following:



Why are you interested in working with StressKnotNYC?

Have you handled scheduling or dispatching before? If yes, briefly explain your experience.

Are you comfortable speaking with clients and therapists on the phone daily?



This video helps us understand your communication skills, confidence, and professionalism, which are essential for this role. Applications without a video introduction will not be considered.

title: E-Commerce Inventory & Stock Planning Analyst (Serious Role – Accuracy Critical)
description:
???? About The Role



We are a fast-growing UK e-commerce company managing hundreds of products with high inventory costs.



This is a serious business operations role. Stock mistakes cost real money, so accuracy, data analysis, and reliability are critical.



This is not a casual VA role and not a side task.

We are looking for someone who takes ownership of their numbers and decisions.



? Working Hours



Initial setup phase: Higher workload for system setup



After setup: 2–4 hours per day



Long term position



(Salary paid weekly)



Consistent daily checking required



???? Initial Setup Task (Very Important)



You will first:



Analyse our full product catalogue



Set stock targets of 10–20 days of stock per product



Review current stock vs sales velocity



Build or improve our stock planning spreadsheet



Help create tracking systems for shipments and supplier costs



???? Ongoing Responsibilities

???? Inventory Planning



Maintain 10–20 days of stock for each product



Analyse daily / weekly / monthly sales trends



Forecast demand using historical data



Recommend reorder quantities based on data (not guessing)



Prevent stockouts and overstock



???? Data Analysis (Core Part Of Role)



You will regularly analyse:



Sales velocity per product



Trending products (increasing or decreasing demand)



Seasonal or pattern-based demand



Stock investment vs product performance



You must be confident:



Interpreting data



Spotting patterns



Making data-backed recommendations



Explaining what the data is telling us (not just reporting numbers)



???? Supplier Cost & COGS Tracking



Monitor supplier price lists



Update COGS when supplier costs change



Flag cost increases immediately



Track margin risk when supplier pricing changes



???? Weekly Performance Briefs (Report To Owner)



You will send a weekly summary including:



? Best selling products

? Products we should stock more of

? Products trending up or down

? New product opportunities based on data

? Slowest selling products we should consider removing

? Any cost risks or supplier changes



???? Shipment Tracking & Customer ETA Support



You will also:



Track incoming shipments in Excel



Track estimated delivery dates for each product in shipment



Help provide delivery estimates for pre-order customers



Keep shipment tracking sheets fully updated



???? Required Skills

MUST HAVE (Non-Negotiable)



? Strong Excel / Google Sheets

? Strong Data Analysis Skills

? Ability to interpret sales data and trends

? High attention to detail

? Good written English

? Comfortable working with large data sets

? Reliable internet + computer



Strong Advantage



? Shopify

? Inventory planning

? Supply chain or operations experience

? E-commerce analytics



???? Not Suitable If



? You only do data entry

? You rush work to finish faster

? You guess instead of checking data

? You miss deadlines

? You need constant supervision



???? Pay



Competitive based on experience

Performance bonuses available for high accuracy and reliability



???? Growth Opportunity



Potential future roles:



Senior Inventory Planner



Operations Analyst



Operations Manager



We build long-term teams and promote from within.



???? Application Instructions



Please include:



1?? Your experience with inventory, data, or reporting

2?? Example spreadsheet or report you built

3?? Your favourite Excel or Google Sheets formula and why

4?? Include the word “STOCKCONTROL” in your application



???? Work Culture



We value:



Accuracy over speed



Ownership over excuses



Long term loyalty



Clear communication



If you are detail-focused, analytical, and want to be part of a serious long-term team, we would love to hear from you.

title: Management - Law Degree necessary
description:
About Us

 Horseshoe Housing provides fully furnished apartments for short- and medium-term stays through Airbnb and VRBO. As we scale, we’re looking for a highly analytical, detail-oriented professional to strengthen communication with prospective clients and current guests.

This role is ideal for individuals with formal legal training who excel at structured thinking, clear communication, and problem-solving in fast-moving environments.

Schedule

 10 hours/day, 6 days/week (60 hours/week)



What You’ll Do

Lead outreach:
 and call warm leads provided to you, ensuring clear, professional, and timely communication.





Issue coordination: Work with our internal team to resolve guest and operational issues efficiently and thoroughly.





Monthly reporting: Maintain revenue trackers and prepare end-of-month summaries, KPIs, and performance reports.







Ideal Background

s, and documentation

title: Solar Site Survey Coordinator
description:

Missed appointments

Revisits

Problem-solving mindset

Positive internal feedback on responsiveness

description:

We are not looking for someone to just “make it look nice”.

We want someone who understands how to design pages that increase trust, improve navigation, and increase conversion rate.



???? Project Overview

? Homepage

? Overall site cleanliness and professionalism

Please visit:

????

Category buttons such as:

Mobile-first improvements

Trust signals near purchase button

Mobile buying experience improvements



Overall Website Improvements



Better category structure (brands, collections, etc.)



Better shopping journey flow



More premium brand feel



Faster decision-making for customers



???? REQUIRED – Application Task (Important)



To be considered, you must:



Step 1 — Audit Our Website



Visit our website and review it fully.



Step 2 — Create A Video Presentation



Record a video walking through our website and explain:



? What you would improve

? Why you would improve it

? What you would implement

? What you believe would increase conversions

You can use Loom or similar video tools.



? Estimated Timeline Requirement

How long product page redesign would take



How long full implementation would take???? Pay



Hourly role.



???? Starting:  per hour depending on experience

Regular ongoing work available



Potential to move into larger projects



???? Required Skills



? Shopify Website Design

? Conversion Rate Optimisation (CRO)

???? To Apply

Links to live stores you worked on



Your video audit of our website

???? Not Suitable If



? You only do graphic design

???? Final Note



We are looking for someone who understands how to design websites that sell, not just websites that look nice.

title: [Quick Placement] Reliable VA Receptionist Full Time Remote
description:
Important: Our application process moves quickly. If you are selected to proceed to the next interview stages, you must be able to respond promptly. Candidates who do not respond in a timely manner may be passed over.



We are currently seeking a Remote Spa Receptionist to manage inbound calls and book spa appointments. This is a long-term, performance-based position. Calls are recorded and reviewed regularly. Continued placement in this role depends on accuracy, professionalism, booking success, reliable attendance, no missed calls during scheduled shifts, quick response times, and the ability to professionally manage complaints and de-escalate dissatisfied clients.



To apply: Please copy the questions below, paste them into your reply, and answer each question thoroughly.



(1) Location & Utilities: Where in the Philippines are you currently located? How often have you experienced power or internet outages in the past year? Do you have backup solutions (e.g., generator, mobile hotspot) to ensure your work is not affected?



(2) Home Setup: Will you be working from home? Is your workspace quiet and suitable for handling calls? Do you have your own computer or laptop? Please attach a screenshot of your current internet speed.



(3) Availability & Speed: Can you consistently work seven days a week, six hours per day, and remain available for the full shift without missed calls? How quickly do you typically answer inbound calls? What is your current typing speed in words per minute?



(4) Call & Complaint Experience: Describe your experience with answering inbound calls, booking or scheduling appointments, customer service, following scripts, and handling complaints. Provide one real example of how you de-escalated an upset client and the outcome.



(5) Tools & Systems: What programs, tools, phone systems, or VoIP platforms have you used for handling calls? Do you have any issues with background noise, power outages, or internet interruptions? How do you take notes and log client interactions during calls?



(6) Voice Recordings: Please submit two short voice recordings. Recording one should demonstrate booking an appointment from 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM with a total amount of $60. Recording two should demonstrate handling a double charge for a 90-minute massage where the client sees two $90 charges and is requesting a refund. Your tone should be calm, polite, and professional.



(7) Current Job: Do you currently have another job? If yes, where, how many hours per week, and what are your roles and tasks in that job?



(8) Schedule, Pay & Start Date: Are you able to work seven days a week, six hours per day, during Central Standard Time (CST) hours without conflicts? What is your expected hourly or monthly rate? What is your earliest physical start date if hired?



(9) Marketing, Design & Video: Do you have experience with online marketing, creating content using Canva, or producing short video clips such as
 Reels or similar platforms? Please describe your skills and provide samples of your previous work if available.



(10) Fit, Skills & Experience: Briefly introduce yourself and explain why you would be a good fit for this role. Include what you believe is most important when handling spa clients over the phone, especially during complaints, and what other skills or areas you have a lot of experience in.

title: Virtual Assistant
description:
Virtual Assistant – Operations & Reporting (Part-Time / Remote)



About the Role

We are looking for a highly organized, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support the operational and administrative needs of a growing consulting business. This role focuses on managing recurring weekly and monthly tasks—especially reporting, data organization, account management, and keeping internal processes running smoothly.



If you’re someone who thrives on routine, loves structure, and has strong systems thinking, this is a great fit.



Key Responsibilities



Weekly Tasks

 • Generate and organize weekly performance reports

 • Update internal tracking dashboards (KPIs, metrics, client progress, invoices, etc.)

 • Review and reconcile accounts or client files for accuracy

 • Ensure all automated systems (CRM, reporting tools, project trackers) are functioning and notify of any issues

 • Prepare weekly summaries for management



Monthly Tasks

 • Prepare monthly performance, financial, and operational reports

 • Reconcile accounts and ensure accuracy across platforms

 • Update client billing summaries or retainer usage where applicable

 • Organize monthly data exports and backups

 • Maintain updated SOPs for recurring tasks



General Administrative Support

 • Maintain internal databases and client records

 • Assist with account management and follow-ups

 • Document new processes as they are added

 • Support ad hoc tasks related to operations and reporting

 • Proactively identify inefficiencies and suggest improvements



Required Skills & Experience

 • Strong organizational and administrative abilities

 • Experience with spreadsheets (Google Sheets / Excel)

 • Comfortable with reporting, dashboards, and basic data summarization

 • Excellent attention to detail

 • Strong communication skills

 • Ability to handle recurring deadlines reliably

 • Self-directed with good problem-solving skills

 • Experience with CRM systems, automation tools, or project management platforms is an asset



Nice-to-Have Experience

 • Familiarity with automation platforms (Make.com, Zapier)

 • Experience in consulting, operations, or sales support

 • Knowledge of invoice management or bookkeeping basics

 • Ability to produce simple templates or SOPs



Working Style

 • Remote

 • Part-time, flexible hours

 • Must be responsive and consistent with weekly and monthly deadlines

 • Comfortable working autonomously with minimal oversight

title: Virtual Assistant who #Believes in Entrepreneurs | Flexible Schedule
description:
We're trying to solve the world's biggest problem: People don't #Believe in themselves enough. For over 22 years, Evan Carmichael has been dedicated to this mission. The way we're approaching this problem is producing inspirational content at scale. The right video at the right time can completely change someone's life and we want to touch as many lives as possible. People may not have a supportive family or community around them, but our content can help give them the belief they need to chase their dreams and make the world a better place. We want to work with people who also want to make an impact and touch people's lives. In your application, please put ‘I am your next awesome VA!’ in the subject line. We’re looking for someone who’s curious, kind, takes initiative, wants to grow, and cares about being part of something meaningful. Please also share the link to your resume and portfolio, what your hourly salary expectations are, and in the first line of your message tell us how many YouTube subscribers Evan Carmichael has, followed by who your favorite entrepreneur of all time is and why. Please make sure to send your job application here on OnlineJobs and not via
. The job is full time (40 hours per week) with a flexible schedule. We would start off with a small project for now and we'd pay you for your ideas and research. We also like to work with people over a long period of time, not just short contracts, and give them opportunities to succeed and do more based on what they want to learn. Hopefully that will be you! Thank you for reading and good luck! Sending lots of love! Irish #Believe

title: Digital Operations Manager / Executive Assistant to CEO
description:
ABOUT US



We are a US-based commerce company, the American arm of an established European e-commerce and trading group operating across 29 countries with 650,000+ products across multiple brands in construction, home improvement, sustainability, and premium bath & kitchen.



We are also a US distributor of a European contactless QR-payment solution for churches, nonprofits, and venues.



Our motto: "Do it with Passion or don't do it at all."



We are building a Commerce 4.0 infrastructure with AI-driven automation, and we need a sharp, resourceful person to become the CEO's digital right hand.





THIS IS NOT A TYPICAL VA ROLE



We are looking for someone who thinks like an entrepreneur, not just an assistant. You will co-build operations across the USA and Southeast Asia, manage teams, drive sales, and grow with us into a leadership position. If you want to be part of building something big - this is your opportunity.





YOUR ROLE - SIX KEY AREAS



1. US FINTECH PRODUCT - Sales & Distribution Support

We distribute a European contactless QR-payment solution for churches, zoos, museums, and nonprofits in the US market. We're building the sales infrastructure from scratch - so tell us what tools you've worked with and we'll set it up together.

- Build and maintain lead lists (churches, zoos, museums, nonprofits across the US)

- Set up and manage a CRM pipeline from zero (you recommend the tool, we d
 together)

- Coordinate
 campaigns and follow-ups with our US Managing Partner

- Prepare sales materials, proposals, and demo scheduling

- Research target markets and verticals

As this grows, you'll hire sales support and manage them - so you need to understand the full sales cycle yourself first.



2. VIETNAM & SOUTHEAST ASIA - Team Building

We are building a remote operations team in Southeast Asia (Vietnam and Philippines). You will help recruit, onboard, and coordinate.

- Post job openings on local platforms (VietnamWorks, TopCV, TopDev, OnlineJobs.ph)

- Screen candidates, conduct initial interviews, coordinate with CEO for final decisions

- Set up daily standups, reporting, and project tracking (Slack, Notion, GitHub)

- Act as the bridge between Austrian HQ and the Southeast Asian team

- Help evaluate EOR providers and manage contractor compliance

You'll eventually hand off daily coordination to a local team lead - but first you need to build the processes and understand what good looks like.



3. E-COMMERCE BACKOFFICE & OPERATIONS

Our European parent company operates multiple brands and marketplaces (Amazon, eBay, ManoMano, own webshops). A core priority from Day 1 is launching (or relaunching) our US marketplace channels - Amazon USA, eBay USA, and later Walmart.

- Build, optimize, and launch product listings on Amazon, eBay, and Walmart US

- Develop pricing strategies, fulfillment setup (FBA/FBM), and shipping logistics for the US market

- Marketplace ticket management and customer communication

- Order processing, supplier coordination, shipping tracking

- EPR compliance tracking across European jurisdictions

- Product data management and listing optimization

Once the channels run smoothly, you'll hire dedicated marketplace managers - but you need to have done it yourself to know what "smooth" looks like.



4. AUTOMATION & DIGITAL TOOLS

We automate everything we can. You should be comfortable with modern tools.

- Help build and maintain workflows in n8n (our automation platform)

- Create reports, dashboards, and data summaries

- Manage content calendars for LinkedIn and social media

- Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude) productively for content, research, and analysis

- Document processes and create SOPs for repeatable tasks



5. FINANCE & ACCOUNTING

You take ownership of the financial back office and make sure everything is clean, organized, and transparent.

- Restructure and maintain the bookkeeping system across multiple entities (US and Europe)

- Prepare and track invoices, credit notes, and payment reminders

- Monitor incoming and outgoing payments, reconcile bank accounts

- Coordinate with the external accountant and tax advisor (monthly closings, VAT filings, annual statements)

- Prepare financial summaries and reports for the CEO

- Track expenses, budgets, and profitability per channel and brand

- Ensure compliance with local tax requirements across jurisdictions



6. DIGITAL MARKETING & SOCIAL COMMERCE

Modern e-commerce doesn't work without strong digital presence. You'll build and manage our marketing channels.

- LinkedIn content strategy and posting (for the CEO and company profiles)

- TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube for product marketing and brand building

- AI-generated content creation (using tools like ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney for posts, videos, and ads)

- Influencer marketing and AI influencer strategies

-
 and Instagram Shopping integration

-
 marketing and newsletter campaigns

- SEO basics and performance tracking

- Paid ads coordination (Google Ads, Meta Ads - working with specialists)

You don't need to be a full-time content creator - but you need to understand what works, set the strategy, and eventually hire specialists (content creators, video editors, ad managers) that you can properly manage and evaluate.





WHO YOU ARE



Your Personality:

You are the kind of person who opens their laptop in the morning and already knows what needs to happen today - without being told. You learn new tools over a weekend, not in a training program. When something breaks, you don't wait for instructions - you find a fix, implement it, and then report what you did. You thrive in fast-paced environments where no two days look the same.



You're comfortable making decisions on your own in day-to-day operations (backoffice, tickets, scheduling), but you also know when to check in with the CEO on strategic calls (hiring decisions, client communication, new processes). You're not looking for a 9-to-5 routine - you want to build something and grow with it.



IMPORTANT: THE COORDINATOR MINDSET



Let's be clear about what this role really is. We don't expect you to be a world-class expert in every single area listed below. What we DO expect is that you've done enough of it yourself to truly understand how it works - the pain points, the shortcuts, the quality standards. Why? Because your real job is to build a team around you that handles the specialist work, and you need to be able to tell the difference between great work and garbage. You can only control what you understand. If you've never run an ad campaign, you can't evaluate someone who does it for you. If you've never reconciled a bank account, you won't catch mistakes. We need someone who has been in the trenches, understands the work, and can then hire, train, and manage the people who do it day-to-day. You don't need to be the best at everything - but you need to have done everything at least once.



The Skills That Matter Most:



1. Fast Learner & Tech-Native (Most Important)

This is non-negotiable. Our stack changes, our tools evolve, and we move fast. You pick up a new platform in hours, not weeks. If someone shows you n8n or a new CRM, you're productive within days.



2. High Capacity & Multitasking Under Pressure

You'll manage sales leads in the morning, screen a developer candidate in Southeast Asia before lunch, handle marketplace tickets in the afternoon, and prepare a report for the CEO by evening. You need to context-switch cleanly and keep quality high across all areas.



3. Professional Communication

You write
s that clients and partners take seriously. Your English is flawless - not just grammatically correct, but professional, clear, and appropriate for business contexts in the US and Europe.



4. Initiative & Problem-Solving

When you see a gap, you flag it - or better, you close it. You don't wait to be micromanaged. You suggest improvements, find better ways to do things, and take ownership of outcomes, not just tasks.





HARD SKILLS BY AREA



US Fintech Product / Sales Support:

- CRM setup and management (tell us what you've used - we're building from scratch together) - Required

-
 campaign setup and coordination - Required

- Lead research and list building - Required

- Sales material preparation (decks, proposals) - Nice to have

- Understanding of payment processing / fintech - Nice to have



Southeast Asia Team Building:

- Experience posting jobs and screening candidates (Upwork, OnlineJobs.ph, VietnamWorks) - Required

- Remote team coordination (Slack, Notion, daily standups) - Required

- Experience managing or leading a remote team of 3+ people - Strongly preferred

- Knowledge of EOR/contractor compliance in Southeast Asia - Nice to have



E-Commerce Backoffice:

- Marketplace operations (Amazon Seller Central, eBay) - Required

- Experience launching or building marketplace channels from scratch - Strongly preferred

- Fulfillment knowledge (FBA, FBM, 3PL) - Strongly preferred

- Order management and customer service - Required

- Product data management and listing optimization - Nice to have



Automation & Digital Tools:

- Google Workspace power user (Sheets, Docs, Drive) - Required

- Experience with at least one automation tool (n8n, Zapier, Make) - Strongly preferred

- Comfortable using AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude) for content and automation - Required

- Marketing automation 
 sequences, social scheduling) - Nice to have



Digital Marketing & Social Commerce:

- Experience managing social media accounts (LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok, or YouTube) - Required

- Content creation or coordination (posts, short videos, newsletters) - Required

- Understanding of AI content tools (ChatGPT, Midjourney, Canva AI, etc.) - Strongly preferred

- Paid ads experience (Google Ads, Meta Ads) - Nice to have, can hire specialists

- SEO basics and analytics (Google Analytics, Search Console) - Nice to have

- Influencer outreach or partnership management - Nice to have



Finance & Accounting:

- Bookkeeping experience (invoicing, payment tracking, bank reconciliation) - Required

- Experience coordinating with external accountants / tax advisors - Required

- Understanding of multi-entity or multi-country financial structures - Strongly preferred

- Proficiency in Excel/Google Sheets for financial reporting - Required

- Knowledge of US and/or European VAT/sales tax basics - Nice to have





YOUR IDEAL BACKGROUND



You're the right person if you come from one of these paths:

- Senior VA / Executive Assistant who managed operations for an e-commerce founder and is ready for a leadership role

- E-commerce Operations Manager from a marketplace seller or D2C brand

- BPO Team Lead / Project Manager who coordinated multiple clients or workstreams

- Startup Operations Generalist who wore many hats and loved it





NON-NEGOTIABLE REQUIREMENTS

- Excellent English (written and spoken) - C1/C2 level

- 3+ years of relevant professional experience

- Available for 4+ hours daily overlap with Central European Time (CET / UTC+1)

- Reliable high-speed internet and professional home office setup

- Based in the Philippines or Vietnam





YOUR GROWTH PATH



Phase 1 - Build the Foundation (Month 1-3)

You and the CEO launch (or relaunch) the US marketplace channels: Amazon USA and eBay USA go live with optimized listings, pricing, and fulfillment. A major priority in this phase is restructuring the entire bookkeeping and financial operations: cleaning up accounts, establishing clear processes for invoicing, payment tracking, and reporting, and setting up a reliable monthly closing workflow with the external accountant. By the end of month 3, the US channels are generating revenue and the financial back office is fully organized and transparent.



Phase 2 - Delegate & Expand (Month 3-6)

With the core channels running, you hire one or more tea
mbers to take over daily marketplace operations and customer service. You expand into additional channels (Walmart, Shopify US) and oversee the new hires. You and the CEO begin building automation workflows together using AI tools and a dedicated developer.



Phase 3 - Launch, Hand Off, Repeat (Month 6-12)

You operate on a 2-month launch cycle: identify a new project, build it, stabilize it, hand it off to your growing team, and move to the next one. You oversee all tea
mbers, ensure quality, and keep the machine running while pushing into new territory. The company begins offering its proven launch and operations expertise as a service to other brands.



Phase 4 - Leadership (Year 2+)

You've built a team, launched multiple projects, and proven you can run operations independently. The conversation shifts to COO, Country Manager, or equity participation.



WHAT WE OFFER

- Competitive base salary (discussed during interview)

- Performance-based bonus structure tied to company revenue and project success

- Clear growth path from Operations Manager to leadership (COO / Country Manager)

- Direct access to the CEO - no middle management, no bureaucracy

- The opportunity to build something real from the ground up





HOW TO APPLY



Send us:

1. Your CV/Resume (English)

2. A short cover letter (max 1 page): Why this role? What's your superpower?

3. Links to relevant work: LinkedIn profile, portfolio, or references

4. Your earliest start date

5. Bonus: A 2-minute video introducing yourself (not required, but it helps!)



US-European Commerce Group | Tampa, FL

Operating across 29 countries | USA - Europe - Southeast Asia

description:

Their main job will to cold call new leads ( MOSTLY ALL B to B)  and setup appointments for the sales reps if they seem promising. title: Freelance Graphic Designer with WordPress, Elementor, Go High Level, and AI Expertise
description:
**Job Title: Freelance Graphic Designer with WordPress, Elementor, Go High Level, and AI Expertise**



**Location:** Remote  

**Job Type:** Part-Time (Potential for Full-Time)



**Introduction:**  

We are a dynamic company managing multiple websites, both on WordPress with Elementor and on the Go High Level platform. We are looking for a highly skilled freelance graphic designer who can bring a blend of design expertise and technical knowledge to help us enhance our online presence. If you are passionate about design, have a strong background in UX/UI, and are proficient with WordPress, Elementor, and Go High Level, we would love to hear from you.



**Key Responsibilities:**  

- Design and build visually stunning and user-friendly WordPress websites using Elementor.  

- Craft engaging and responsive pages on the Go High Level platform.  

- Utilize AI tools to optimize design processes and outcomes.  

- Enhance website UX/UI for optimal user engagement.  

- Collaborate and communicate effectively with our team.  

- Stay updated with industry trends and integrate innovative solutions.



**Qualifications:**  

- Proven experience in graphic design with a portfolio showcasing your work.  

- Proficiency in WordPress, Elementor, and Go High Level.  

- Familiarity with AI tools and platforms like Base44 or Lovable.  

- Strong understanding of UX/UI principles and best practices.  

- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects.  

- Excellent communication skills to articulate design concepts and collaborate with the team.



**Preferred Skills:**  

- Experience with AI-driven design tools.  

- Knowledge of SEO best practices for WordPress.  

- Familiarity with other design software such as Adobe Creative Suite.



**Why Join Us?**  

- Flexible working hours with the potential for a long-term engagement.  

- Opportunity to work on diverse projects for small businesses.  

- Collaborative and supportive team environment.  

- Potential to transition into a more tenured role based on performance.



**Application Process:**  

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume, a cover letter detailing their experience and skills, and a portfolio of relevant work. Please ensure you answer the following questions:  

1. Describe your experience with WordPress, Elementor, and Go High Level.  

2. Share examples of websites or pages you've designed and built using these tools.  

3. Provide insights into your UX/UI design process.  

4. Highlight any experience with AI tools, particularly in design.  

5. Explain how you manage project timelines and ensure deadlines are met.



***Attention to detail matters. Please don't send blank responses without these details as they won't be considered.



We look forward to discovering how your expertise can contribute to our company's growth and success.

title: Social Media Specialist
description:
**Now Hiring: Social Media Specialist (Remote | Full-Time, PST Hours)**



Work From Anywhere | Join a Fast-Growing Real Estate Company



We’re looking for a creative and strategic Social Media Specialist to build and execute a company-wide social media strategy, create engaging content, and turn online engagement into real leads for our sales team. Real estate experience is a plus, but not required.



*About the Role

Position: Social Media Specialist

Location: Anywhere – 100% Remote

Work Hours: Monday–Friday, 8:00 AM–5:00 PM Pacific Time

(Occasional weekend work up to 4 hours)

Work Duration: 40 hours/week



In this role, you will lead the development and execution of our company-wide social media strategy, create and schedule intentional content, actively manage engagement across all platforms, and generate qualified leads for the sales team. You will play a key role in strengthening brand presence, growing audiences, and driving inbound opportunities through social media.



*Responsibilities

     -Devise and execute a company-wide social media strategy aligned with business goals

     -Create, schedule, and publish engaging content across social media platforms on a consistent basis

     -Maintain high-quality engagement by responding to comments, messages, and interactions promptly

     -Grow audience, brand visibility, and credibility across platforms

     -Generate qualified leads through social media efforts and share them with the sales team

     -Track performance metrics and continuously optimize content and strategy



*Qualifications

     -Proven experience managing social media accounts for a brand or business

     -Proven experience in social media strategy and intentional content creation

     -Strong understanding of content creation, engagement strategies, and lead generation

     -Excellent written communication skills in English

     -Organized, proactive, and able to work independently

     -Experience with real estate social media is a plus, but not required



*Technical Requirements – Social Media Specialist

     -Reliable high-speed internet and a capable laptop/desktop

     -Experience with
, Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn

     -Familiarity with social media management tools (Meta Business Suite, Hootsuite, Buffer, etc.)

     -Basic content creation skills using Canva, CapCut, or similar tools

     -Comfortable using Google Workspace and team collaboration tools



*Compensation

     -$5-$6 per hour (based on experience)

     -13th Month Pay

     -Bi-weekly Pay



*Benefits Package  (Applicable once the employee is regularized after the probationary period)

     -10 days of paid time off (PTO)

     -Maxicare health insurance coverage

     -Sales bonus for every real estate property successfully sold

     -SV anniversary gifts

     -Birthday gift

     -13th Month Pay, with the potential to earn two to three times the standard amount, depending on individual performance and overall company results



* How to Apply Please submit:

     -Resume (PDF or Word)

     -Internet speed test screenshot

     -Computer specs

     -Short video (Loom or YouTube) introducing yourself explaining your experience running comps and supporting real estate analysis



Ready to grow with us?

Apply now and join SV Ventures — where data-driven insights power smart decisions.

title: AI Video Content Producer & Social Media Manager
description:
Role Summary

We are seeking an experienced offshore virtual assistant to support a growing Legal Nurse Consulting education and services business. You will function as a multi-skilled creator and operator—owning content production, social media management, graphics, AI-assisted video creation (faceless and/or using approved likeness assets), marketing/media execution, website management, and light software development/automation.



This role supports:

Legal Nurse Consultant training courses (education products)

Medical record review services for attorneys

Building a subcontracting network of legal nurse consultants



Key Responsibilities

A) Content Creation (Core)

Create and repurpose content from long-form sources (webinars, trainings, blog posts, case-based lessons) into:

Short-form posts, carousels, reels/shorts,
 snippets, blog articles, lead magnets

Write in a professional, credible tone suitable for legal/medical audiences

Develop and manage a content calendar (weekly/monthly), including campaigns and launches

Ensure brand consistency: voice, messaging pillars, disclaimers, and calls-to-action



B) Social Media Management (Core)

Manage posting schedule across platforms (e.g., Instagram,
, LinkedIn, TikTok, YouTube Shorts)

Community management: respond to comments/DMs using approved guidelines

Social analytics and reporting: track KPIs, identify what’s working, optimize content

Manage collaborations, podcast outreach, guest appearances, and basic PR follow-up



C) Graphic Design & Creative Production (Core)

Design branded templates and assets: carousels, thumbnails, banners, lead magnets, course visuals

Produce consistent brand look/feel (fonts, colors, layouts) across platforms

Basic photo editing and visual cleanup for professional presentation

D) AI Video Creation (Core + Specialized)



You will create AI-assisted videos that may be:

Faceless videos (voiceover + b-roll, captions, stock footage, animations)

Videos using approved likeness assets (e.g., talking-head overlays, image-driven video, avatar-driven video, or “video with content behind the speaker”)

Important: Any use of the business owner’s likeness must be done only with explicit permission and using approved assets and platform-compliant methods.

Script short-form videos optimized for retention (hooks, structure, CTA)

Create storyboards and shot lists for consistent weekly production

Edit videos with captions, on-screen text, b-roll, and brand elements

Maintain a reusable workflow (templates, presets, file naming, asset library)



E) Marketing, Funnels, and Media Support

Build/maintain lead magnets, landing pages, opt-in flows, and
 sequences

Support course launches: promotional calendars, announcements, countdown sequences

Basic SEO tasks (blog formatting, keyword optimization, internal linking, metadata)

Coordinate basic ads support (creative versions, UTM links, tracking—if applicable)



F) Website Management & Buildout

Create and manage website pages: home, about, services, courses, blog, contact, booking

Maintain website updates, plugin/app updates, backups, basic troubleshooting

Improve speed, mobile responsiveness, accessibility basics, and UX flow

Implement tracking pixels/analytics and conversion events as needed



G) Operations Support (Nice-to-have but Valuable)

Organize files, SOPs, templates, content library, and brand assets

Set up project management boards and keep work moving

Support building a subcontractor network:

outreach systems, onboarding packets, scheduling interviews, maintaining a roster



H) Light Software Development / Automation (Preferred)

Build simple automations to reduce manual work (e.g., lead intake, content workflows, CRM updates)

Integrate tools via Zapier/Make/API connections

Basic scripting (Python/JavaScript) for small internal tools, data cleanup, reporting, or simple web features



Required Skills & Qualifications (Must Have)

Proven experience as a VA supporting content + social media + marketing execution

Strong English writing and editing (professional, clear, accurate)

Experience creating short-form video content (Reels/Shorts/TikTok)

Familiarity with AI-assisted content workflows (ChatGPT-style tools, captioning, repurposing)

Graphic design competence (brand-consistent social graphics, thumbnails, carousels)

Website editing/management experience (WordPress, Squarespace, Wix, or similar)

Excellent organization, initiative, and ability to work independently

Ability to handle sensitive information with discretion and professionalism

Preferred Skills (Nice to Have)

Experience in healthcare, legal services, or professional education markets

 marketing + funnels (ConvertKit/Mailchimp/Klaviyo, etc.)

SEO and blog strategy

Basic paid ads creative/testing understanding

Automation tools (Zapier/Make) + basic API familiarity

Basic software development skills (HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Python, or similar)

Video AI tools experience (avatar/voiceover/video generation) using approved and ethical workflows

Tools You Should Be Comfortable With (or willing to learn quickly)

Project Management: Trello/Asana/ClickUp/Notion

Design: Canva (required), Adobe/other tools (bonus)

Video Editing: CapCut, Descript, Premiere, or similar

AI Tools: ChatGPT-style writing tools; captioning/transcription tools

Social Scheduling: Metricool/Later/Buffer/Hootsuite (any)

Web: WordPress/Squarespace/Wix + basic plugins/apps

/Funnels: ConvertKit/Mailchimp/Kajabi/Teachable (any)

Automation: Zapier/Make (preferred)



Work Style & Expectations

Offshore/remote role; consistent weekly availability

Reliable internet, ability to attend occasional meetings as needed

Proactive: brings ideas, identifies improvements, suggests new content angles

Ability to create, revise, and finalize work based on feedback quickly

Maintain confidentiality and sign NDA + IP assignment agreement

Deliverables & Success Metrics (Examples)

4–7 short videos/week (faceless and/or approved likeness workflow)

3–5 posts/week (mix of carousels, single-image, thought leadership, promotional)

Monthly content calendar planned in advance

Website kept current; landing pages built as needed

Growth in leads,
 opt-ins, consultation bookings, and course inquiries

Clear reporting: what was posted, performance, next actions



To Apply

Please provide:

A brief summary of your experience in content + social + video + web

Portfolio links (social graphics, short-form videos, any websites)

Tools you use (design/video/social/web/automation)

Your weekly availability and time zone

Your expected monthly rate or hourly rate

title: Google Business Profile Optimization Sprint - Medicare Insurance Agency (1-Week Project)
description:
This is a 7-day sprint project to rapidly optimize our Google Business Profile and test if we work well together.

We're a Medicare insurance agency in Florida (Pinellas, Hillsborough, Manatee, Pasco counties). We need our GBP transformed from inactive to optimized and posting-ready—FAST.

If you crush this sprint, we'll immediately offer ongoing work (GBP management + lead research, 20-30 hrs/week).



Project Scope: 7 Days

Day 1-2: Audit & Optimize



Audit current GBP listing(s), flag any duplicates

Optimize business description (we provide compliance-approved copy)

Add all service areas (4 FL counties)

Upload 10 photos minimum (office, team, service area—we provide or you source stock)

Set up Q&A section with 6 common Medicare questions (we approve answers)

Deliverable: Optimization checklist completed, before/after screenshots



Day 3-5: Content Creation



Create 6 GBP posts ready to publish



Topics: AEP deadlines, turning-65 checklist, Medicare basics, local senior resources

We provide topic list + compliance rules





Design 3 simple Canva graphics (or use stock images)

Deliverable: 6 posts drafted in Google Doc for approval



Day 6: Launch & Templates



Publish first 2 approved posts

Create 30-day content calendar (post topics + schedule)

What We Provide:

title: Review & Reputation Management Specialist
description:
Review & Reputation Management Specialist

Full-Time | Remote | Gear Elevation



Gear Elevation is growing fast—and as we expand our product lines and marketplace presence, we are looking for a dedicated Review & Reputation Management Specialist who will fully own and elevate our brand reputation across all major review platforms.



This role ensures our customers see Gear Elevation as a trusted brand by increasing our ratings, managing incoming reviews, and building strong relationships with vendors and internal teams.



ROLE OVERVIEW

The Review & Reputation Management Specialist will be responsible for managing, improving, and maintaining Gear Elevation’s online reputation. This includes Trustpilot, Sitejabber, BBB, marketplace reviews, and internal review systems. The specialist will also handle review uploads for new and existing listings and coordinate closely with vendors and customer service teams.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

1. Reputation & Review Platform Management

 • Manage and optimize Gear Elevation’s profiles on Trustpilot, Sitejabber, BBB, and other review platforms.

 • Implement strategies to increase star ratings, improve credibility, and boost customer trust.

 • Monitor daily incoming reviews (100+ per day), classify and moderate them based on internal standards.

 • Handle the workflow for negative reviews (1–3 stars), including escalation and coordination with customer support.

 • Ensure timely responses to reviewers using approved templates and consistent brand voice.

2. Review Publishing for Product Listings

 • Add and update 4–5 star reviews for new and existing listings across all Gear Elevation sales channels.

 • Maintain accuracy of reviews when product updates, bundles, or new variations are launched.

 • Develop and maintain a centralized Review Library for marketing, ads, creati ves, and listing teams.

3. Review Request Flow & Automation

 • Manage and optimize review request automations for post-purchase
s and SMS.

 • Collaborate with Customer Support to improve internal review-handling processes.

 • Monitor Loox, TrustPilot, and internal tools for performance and adjust workflows accordingly.

4. Vendor & Internal Team Coordination

 • Work closely with vendors and fulfillment teams to address product issues that affect reviews.

 • Forward relevant review insights or concerns to product, listing, QA, or operations teams.

 • Gather required documents or details for review disputes, verifications, or product updates.

5. Reporting & Insights

 • Prepare weekly reports covering:

 • Review volume and sentiment

 • Trustpilot/Sitejabber rating trends

 • Top issues, customer feedback patterns

 • Opportunities for improvement

 • Track KPIs for sentiment improvement, review turnaround time, and listing review health.



QUALIFICATIONS

 • Experience in eCommerce, reputation management, moderation, or customer experience preferred.

 • Familiarity with platforms such as Trustpilot, Sitejabber, BBB, Loox, 
, Shopify, TikTok Shop.

 • Excellent written English and attention to detail.

 • Highly organized and can manage a high volume of daily reviews.

 • Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving.

 • Ability to coordinate across multiple departments and external vendors.

 • Proactive and able to work independently.



SUCCESS METRICS / KPIs

 • Trustpilot, Sitejabber, and BBB star rating improvements

 • Increased volume of verified positive reviews

 • Reduction of negative-review impact

 • Timely publishing of reviews for new listings

 • Accurate and consistent weekly reporting

 • Strong collaboration with internal and external teams



ABOUT GEAR ELEVATION

Gear Elevation is a global eCommerce brand known for innovative products designed to elevate everyday living. We are committed to exceptional customer experiences and continuously improving our online presence. This role plays a key part in ensuring our brand remains trusted and highly rated across all channels.

title: Facebook Ads Manager (Remote)
description:
About Apex Operations

Apex Operations is a San Jose–based contractor marketing agency specializing in websites, SEO, media, and automation for construction, design, and trade professionals. We operate as a full-service growth partner, providing the expertise and execution power of an in-house marketing department.



We build marketing systems that generate consistent, high-quality leads, and we are now expanding our Paid Ads Department through a long-term partnership with a small, specialized Meta Ads team.



Who We’re Looking For



We are seeking a
 Ads Team (not individual freelancers) that can take full ownership of:

- Meta Ads strategy

- Funnel performance

- Tracking + attribution

- Creative direction

- Lead generation systems

- Multi-account management



Your team must already be structured and capable of handling multiple contractor/home-service clients at once.



YOUR MISSION

Your team will run and manage Meta 
 + Instagram) campaigns for multiple contractor and home-service accounts.

You will oversee:

- Strategy

- Execution

- Funnels

- Tracking

- Optimization

- Reporting



Your goal: produce consistent, scalable, high-quality leads for our clients.



WHAT YOUR TEAM WILL DO

1. STRATEGY (Most Important Part)

You will own the strategy behind each campaign, including:

- Crafting angles, hooks, and scripts

- Understanding contractor/home-service buyer psychology

- Proposing innovative and conversion-driven ideas

- Mapping full funnels (awareness ? lead ? booked call)

- Using data to identify winning patterns

- Bringing proactive solutions — NOT waiting for instructions

- You must think like a performance marketer.



2. META ADS EXECUTION

You will:

- Launch, manage, and optimize campaigns with budgets of $1,500+/mo

- Test creatives, copy, audiences, placements

- Improve CPL, CTR, CPA consistently

 - Run weekly testing cycles

 - Engineer conversions — not just press buttons

 - This role is about building systems, not simply boosting posts.



3. TRACKING & ATTRIBUTION (GoHighLevel)

You will:

- Set up tracking & attribution correctly

- Ensure all leads flow into Go High Level

- Build automations, pipelines, workflows, nurture campaigns

- Monitor lead quality

- Tag and segment leads

- Provide weekly reporting

- Fix issues OR communicate exactly what needs to be fixed

- We expect clean, accurate data — always.



4. CREATIVE DIRECTION (Not Editing)

You will NOT edit videos or design images.

But you WILL:

- Write hooks

- Write ad scripts

- Suggest new creative angles

- Direct editors on what assets are needed

- Analyze performance and make creative recommendations

- You are the brain behind the creative engine.



5. COMMUNICATION

You must communicate with clarity and consistency:

- Daily Slack check-ins

- Same-day responses

- Weekly performance reviews

- Loom video explanations when needed

- Proof behind decisions (“Here’s why this works…”)

- Poor communication = automatic no-hire.



WEEKLY RESPONSIBILITIES SUMMARY

- Launch + optimize Meta ads

- Build funnels, forms, landing pages

- Track conversions & analyze data

- Document systems & test new ideas

- Report on performance & lead quality

- Coordinate with the founder and internal team

- Maintain high-quality lead flow for multiple clients



WHAT YOUR TEAM NEEDS (Minimum Requirements)

- 2+ years running Meta Ads (preferably for construction or home services)

- Experience managing $1,500+/mo budgets

- GoHighLevel mastery (automations, opportunities, workflows, triggers)

- Ability to build and optimize landing pages

- Strong understanding of funnels & buyer psychology

- Proven ability to lower CPL and scale winning campaigns

- Excellent English communication (written + spoken)

- Highly proactive and solution-oriented

- Analytical mindset — makes decisions based on data, not guesses

- Ability to manage multiple client accounts



BONUS POINTS

- Experience with construction, roofing, gutters, siding, solar, electrical, plumbing, or remodeling niches

- Familiarity with seasonal demand cycles

- Ability to build UGC scripts for contractors

- Experience with A/B testing frameworks

- Experience working in a fast-moving agency environment



WHY JOIN APEX OPERATIONS

This isn’t just a freelance gig. It’s an opportunity to help build a performance-driven department inside a company on track toward multiple 7-figures.



Here’s what you can expect:

- Creative freedom

- A fast-moving, results-driven environment

- A team where your ideas matter

- Long-term, stable work

- The chance to grow as we grow



If you're hungry to learn, innovate, and help build systems that scale, this is for you.
